housing_price_shreya_kanodia package¶

Submodules¶

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.dict_Config_logger_implementation_file module¶

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.dict_Config_logger_implementation_file.configure_logger(logger=None, cfg=None, log_file=None, console=True, log_level='DEBUG', name='root')¶

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.ingest_data module¶

A script to download and create training and validation datasets. Different input arguments this script will take are-

  1. folder where data(raw and processed will be stored)

  2. Arguments for logging

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.ingest_data.fetch_housing_data(housing_url, housing_path)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.ingest_data.load_housing_data(housing_path)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.ingest_data.pre_process_data(df, imputer=None)¶

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.score module¶

This script is used to score the model(s) we have trained in train.py file. Input Arguments taken by this script are- 1) Folder where models are stored. 2) Folder where test dataset is stored. 3) Folder where output will be stored.

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.score.X_y_creation(df)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.score.load_dataset(path)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.score.model_scoring(models_list)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.score.models_list(model_folder)¶

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.train module¶

This script is used for training the model(s). Input Arguments for this script are-

  1. Folder Path where train dataset is stored.

  2. Folder Path where model will be saved

housing_price_shreya_kanodia.train.X_y_creation(df)¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.train.create_and_save_DTR_model()¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.train.create_and_save_LR_model()¶
housing_price_shreya_kanodia.train.create_and_save_RFR_model()¶
